attributes.action: END BSL (Breed Specific Legislation) and BAN bad owners
attributes.additional_details: we propose to END BSL and give lifetime bans to owners who are caught with fighting dogs.
attributes.background: each year in the UK thousands of dogs are killed for ''looking'' a certain way. often without complaint being seized whilst out on a walk. leaving family's heartbroken and other pets without their companion. BSL was introduced in the UK in 1991 which has led to the deaths of many innocent dogs.
